================================
diffsims |release| documentation
================================

diffsims is an open-source Python library for simulating diffraction.

.. toctree::
    :hidden:
    :titlesonly:

    user/index.rst
    reference/index.rst
    dev/index.rst
    changelog.rst


Installation
============

diffsims can be installed with `pip <https://pypi.org/project/diffsims>`__ or
`conda <https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/diffsims>`__:

.. tab-set::

    .. tab-item:: pip

        .. code-block:: bash

            pip install diffsims

    .. tab-item:: conda

        .. code-block:: bash

            conda install diffsims -c conda-forge

Further details are available in the :doc:`installation guide <user/installation>`.

Citing diffsims
===============

If you are using diffsims in your scientific research, please help our scientific
visibility by citing the Zenodo DOI: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3337900.

diffsims is released under the GPL v3 license.
